column1: }}'''''Return to Moria''''' is a text-adventure by [[Sam Ruby]].<ref>[http://www.meristation.com/v3/des_articulo.php?pic=CON&id=2254&idj=&idp=&tipo=art&c=1&pos=5 Meristation, El Anillo interactivo] p. 6 (retrieved 28 November 2010)</ref><ref name="Tolkien Games">[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/return.html Tolkien Games] (retrieved 28 November 2010)</ref> Whereas ''[[The Mines of Moria (video game)
column2: The Mines of Moria]]'', its prequel, was part of ''[[The Lord of the Rings (Eamon series)
column3: The Lord of the Rings]]'' series, ''Return to Moria'' is the first part of ''[[The War of the Ring (Eamon series)
column4: The War of the Ring]]'' series.<ref name="Tolkien Games"/> In the game, the player needs to find ''[[Mithril]]'' for [[Gondor]] and rouse [[Durin]] to unite all [[Dwarves]] against [[Sauron]].<ref name="Tolkien Games"/>
